Target.Name: F
Target.Description: Algebra: Perform arithmetic operations on polynomials.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Algebra: Understand the relationship between zeros and factors of polynomials.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Algebra: Use polynomial identities to solve problems.

Target.Name: XXX
Target.Description: Algebra: Rewrite rational expressions.

Target.Name: G
Target.Description: Algebra: Create equations that describe numbers or relationships

Target.Name: H
Target.Description: Algebra: Understand solving equations as a process of reasoning and explain the reasoning.

Target.Name: I
Target.Description: Algebra: Solve equations and inequalities in one variable.

Target.Name: J
Target.Description: Algebra: Represent and solve equations and inequalities graphically.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Algebra: Solve systems of equations.

Target.Name: D
Target.Description: Algebra: Interpret the structure of expressions.

Target.Name: E
Target.Description: Algebra: Write expressions in equivalent forms to solve problems.

Target.Name: A-KG
Target.Description: Know number names and the count sequence

Target.Name: B-KG
Target.Description: Count to tell the number of objects.

Target.Name: C-KG
Target.Description: Compare Numbers

Target.Name: B-8
Target.Description: Work with radicals and integer exponents.

Target.Name: C-7
Target.Description: Use properties of operations to generate equivalent expressions.

Target.Name: C-8
Target.Description: Understand the connections between proportional relationships, lines, and linear equations.

Target.Name: D-7
Target.Description: Solve real-life and mathematical problems using numerical and algebraic expressions and equations.

Target.Name: D-8
Target.Description: Analyze and solve linear equations and pairs of simultaneous linear equations.

Target.Name: E-6
Target.Description: Apply and extend previous understandings of arithmetic to algebraic expressions.

Target.Name: F-6
Target.Description: Reason about and solve one-variable equations and inequalities.

Target.Name: G-6
Target.Description: Represent and analyze quantitative relationships between dependent and independent variables.

Target.Name: E-8
Target.Description: Define, evaluate, and compare functions.

Target.Name: F-8
Target.Description: Use functions to model relationships between quantities.

Target.Name: N
Target.Description: Functions: Build a function that models a relationship between two quantities.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Functions: Build new functions from existing functions.

Target.Name: K
Target.Description: Functions: Understand the concept of a function and use function notation.

Target.Name: L
Target.Description: Functions: Interpret functions that arise in applications in terms of the context.

Target.Name: M
Target.Description: Functions: Analyze functions using different representations.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Functions: Construct and compare linear and exponential models and solve problems.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Functions: Interpret expressions for functions in terms of the situation they model.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Functions: Extend the domain of trigonometric functions using the unit circle.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Functions: Model periodic phenomena with trigonometric functions.

Target.Name: XXX
Target.Description: Functions: Prove and apply trigonometric identities.

Target.Name: E-7
Target.Description: Draw, construct, and describe geometrical figures and describe the relationship between them.

Target.Name: F-7
Target.Description: Solve real-life and mathematical problems involving angle measure, area, surface area, and volume.

Target.Name: G-8
Target.Description: Understand congruence and similarity using physical models, transparencies, or geometry software.

Target.Name: H-6
Target.Description: Solve real-world and mathematical problems involving area, surface area, and volume.

Target.Name: H-8
Target.Description: Understand and apply the Pythagorean Theorem.

Target.Name: H-KG
Target.Description: Identify and describe shapes (squares, circles, triangles, rectangles, hexagons, cubes, cones, cylinders, and spheres).

Target.Name: I-8
Target.Description: Solve real-world and mathematical problems involving volume of cylinders, cones, and spheres.

Target.Name: I-KG
Target.Description: Analyze, compare, create, and compose shapes.

Target.Name: J-2
Target.Description: Reason with shapes and their attributes.

Target.Name: J-5
Target.Description: Graph points on the coordinate plane to solve real-world and mathematical problems.

Target.Name: K-1
Target.Description: Reason with shapes and their attributes.

Target.Name: K-3
Target.Description: Reason with shapes and their attributes.

Target.Name: K-5
Target.Description: Classify two-dimensional figures into categories based on their properties.

Target.Name: L-4
Target.Description: Draw and identify lines and angles, and classify shapes by properties of their lines and angles.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Understand and apply theorems about circles.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Geometry: Find arc lengths and areas of sectors of circles.

Target.Name: O
Target.Description: Geometry: Prove geometric theorems.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Experiment with transformations in the place.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Geometry: Understand congruence in terms of rigid motions.

Target.Name: XXX
Target.Description: Geometry: Make geometric constructions.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Explain volume formulas and use them to solve problems.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Geometry: Visualize relationships between two-dimensional and three-dimensional objects.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Translate between the geometric description and the equation for a conic section.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Geometry: Use coordinates to prove simple geometric theorems algebraically.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Apply geometric concepts in modeling situations.

Target.Name: P
Target.Description: Geometry: Define trigonometric ratios and solve problems involving right triangles.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Geometry: Understand similarity in terms of similarity transformations.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Geometry: Prove theorems involving similarity.

Target.Name: XXXX
Target.Description: Geometry: Apply trigonometry to general triangles.

Target.Name: F-2
Target.Description: Measure and estimate lengths in standard units.

Target.Name: F-KG
Target.Description: Describe and compare measurable attributes.

Target.Name: G-2
Target.Description: Relate addition and subtraction to length.

Target.Name: G-3
Target.Description: Solve problems involving measurement and estimation of intervals of time, liquid volumes, and masses of objects.

Target.Name: G-5
Target.Description: Convert like measurement units within a given measurement system.

Target.Name: G-KG
Target.Description: Classify objects and count the number of objects in each category.

Target.Name: H-1
Target.Description: Measure lengths indirectly and by iterating length units.

Target.Name: H-2
Target.Description: Work with time and money.

Target.Name: H-3
Target.Description: Represent and interpret data.

Target.Name: H-5
Target.Description: Represent and interpret data.

Target.Name: I-1
Target.Description: Tell and write time.

Target.Name: I-2
Target.Description: Represent and interpret data.

Target.Name: I-3
Target.Description: Geometric measurement: understand concepts of area and relate area to multiplication and to addition.

Target.Name: I-4
Target.Description: Solve problems involving measurement and conversion of measurement from a larger unit to a smaller unit.

Target.Name: I-5
Target.Description: Geometric measurement: understand concepts of volume and relate volume to multiplication and to addition.

Target.Name: J-1
Target.Description: Represent and interpret data.

Target.Name: J-3
Target.Description: Geometric measurement: recognize perimeter as an attribute of plane figures and distinguish between linear and area measures.

Target.Name: J-4
Target.Description: Represent and interpret data.

Target.Name: K-4
Target.Description: Geometric measurement: understand concepts of angle and measure angles.

Target.Name: C-5
Target.Description: Understand the place value system.

Target.Name: D-2
Target.Description: Understand place value.

Target.Name: D-4
Target.Description: Generalize place value understanding for multi-digit whole numbers.

Target.Name: D-5
Target.Description: Perform operations with multi-digit whole numbers and with decimals to hundredths.

Target.Name: E-1
Target.Description: Extend the counting sequence.

Target.Name: E-2
Target.Description: Use place value understanding and properties of operations to add and subtract.

Target.Name: E-3
Target.Description: Use place value understanding and properties of operations to perform multi-digit arithmetic.

Target.Name: E-4
Target.Description: Use place value understanding and properties of operations to perform multi-digit arithmetic.

Target.Name: E-KG
Target.Description: Work with numbers 11-19 to gain foundations for place value.

Target.Name: F-1
Target.Description: Understand place value.

Target.Name: G-1
Target.Description: Use place value understanding and properties of operations to add and subtract.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Perform arithmetic operations with complex numbers.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Represent complex numbers and their operations on the complex plane.

Target.Name: XXX
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Use complex numbers in polynomial identities and equations.

Target.Name: E-5
Target.Description: Use equivalent fractions as a strategy to add and subtract fractions.

Target.Name: F-3
Target.Description: Develop understanding of fractions as numbers.

Target.Name: F-4
Target.Description: Extend understanding of fractions equivalence and ordering.

Target.Name: F-5
Target.Description: Apply and extend previous understandings of multiplication and division to multiply and divide fractions.

Target.Name: G-4
Target.Description: Build fractions from unit fractions by applying and extending previous understandings of operations on whole numbers.

Target.Name: H-4
Target.Description: Understand decimal notation for fractions, and compare decimal fractions.

Target.Name: C
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Reason quantitatively and use units to solve problems.

Target.Name: A
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Extend the properties of exponents to rational exponents.

Target.Name: B
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Use properties of rational and irrational numbers.

Target.Name: A-8
Target.Description: Know that there are numbers that are not rational, and approximate them by rational numbers.

Target.Name: B-6
Target.Description: Apply and extend previous understandings of multiplication and division to divide fractions by fractions.

Target.Name: B-7
Target.Description: Apply and extend previous understandings of operations with fractions to add, subtract, multiply, and divide rational numbers.

Target.Name: C-6
Target.Description: Compute fluently with muti-digit numbers and find common factors and multiples.

Target.Name: D-6
Target.Description: Apply and extend previous understandings of numbers to the system of rational numbers.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Represent and model with vector quantities.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Perform operations on vectors.

Target.Name: XXX
Target.Description: Number and Quantities: Perform operations on matrices and use matrices in applications.

Target.Name: A-1
Target.Description: Represent and solve problems involving addition and subtraction.

Target.Name: A-2
Target.Description: Represent and solve problems involving addition and subtraction.

Target.Name: A-3
Target.Description: Represent and solve problems involving multiplication and division.

Target.Name: A-4
Target.Description: Use the four operations with whole numbers to solve problems.

Target.Name: A-5
Target.Description: Write and interpret numerical expressions.

Target.Name: B-1
Target.Description: Understand and apply properties of operations and the relationship between addition and subtraction.

Target.Name: B-2
Target.Description: Add and subtract within 20.

Target.Name: B-3
Target.Description: Understand properties of multiplication and the relationship between multiplication and division.

Target.Name: B-4
Target.Description: Get familiarity with factors and multiples.

Target.Name: B-5
Target.Description: Analyze patterns and relationships.

Target.Name: C-1
Target.Description: Add and subtract within 20.

Target.Name: C-2
Target.Description: Work with equal groups of objects to gain foundations for multiplication.

Target.Name: C-3
Target.Description: Multiply and divide within 100.

Target.Name: C-4
Target.Description: Generate and analyze patterns.

Target.Name: D-1
Target.Description: Work with addition and subtraction equations.

Target.Name: D-3
Target.Description: Solve problems involving the four operations, and identify and explain patterns in arithmetic.

Target.Name: D-KG
Target.Description: Understand addition as putting together and adding to, and understand subtraction as taking apart and taking from.

Target.Name: A-6
Target.Description: Understand ration concepts and use ratio reasoning to solve problems.

Target.Name: A-7
Target.Description: Analyze proportional relationships and use them to solve real-world and mathematical problems.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Understand independence and conditional probability and use them to interpret data.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Use the rules of probability to compute probabilities of compound events in a uniform probability model.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Understand and evaluate random processes underlying statistical experiments.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Make inferences and justify conclusions from sample surveys, experiments, and observational studies.

Target.Name: Q
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Summarize, represent, and interpret data on a single count or measurement variable.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Summarize, represent, and interpret data on two categorical and quantitative variables.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Interpret linear models.

Target.Name: X
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Calculate expected values and use them to solve problems.

Target.Name: XX
Target.Description: Statistics and Probability: Use probability to evaluate outcomes of decisions.

Target.Name: G-7
Target.Description: Use random sampling to draw inferences about a population.

Target.Name: H-7
Target.Description: Draw informal comparative inferences about two populations

Target.Name: I-6
Target.Description: Develop understanding of statistical variability.

Target.Name: I-7
Target.Description: Investigate chance processes and develop, use, and evaluate probability models.

Target.Name: J-6
Target.Description: Summarize and describe distributions.

Target.Name: J-8
Target.Description: Investigate patterns of association in bivariate data.

Target.Name: A
Target.Description: Apply mathematics to solve well-posed problems arising in everyday life, society, and the workplace.

Target.Name: B
Target.Description: Select and use appropriate tools strategically.

Target.Name: C
Target.Description: Interpret results in the context of a situation.

Target.Name: D
Target.Description: Identify important quantities in a practical situation and map their relationships (e.g., using diagrams, two-way tables, graphs, flowcharts, or formulas). (DOK 1, 2, 3)

Target.Name: A
Target.Description: Test propositions or conjectures with specific examples.

Target.Name: B
Target.Description: Construct, autonomously, chains of reasoning that will justify or refute propositions or conjectures.

Target.Name: C
Target.Description: State logical assumptions being used.

Target.Name: D
Target.Description: Use the technique of breaking an argument into cases.

Target.Name: E
Target.Description: Distinguish correct logic or reasoning from that which is flawed, and—if there is a flaw in the argument—explain what it is.

Target.Name: F
Target.Description: Base arguments on concrete referents such as objects, drawings, diagrams, and actions.

Target.Name: G
Target.Description: At later grades, determine conditions under which an argument does and does not apply. (For example, area increases with perimeter for squares, but not for all plane figures.)

Target.Name: G
Target.Description: At later grades, determine conditions under which an argument does and does not apply. (For example, area increases with perimeter for squares, but not for all plane figures.)

Target.Name: A
Target.Description: Apply mathematics to solve problems arising in everyday life, society, and the workplace.

Target.Name: B
Target.Description: Construct, autonomously, chains of reasoning to justify mathematical models used, interpretations made, and solutions proposed for a complex problem.

Target.Name: C
Target.Description: State logical assumptions being used.

Target.Name: D
Target.Description: Interpret results in the context of a situation.

Target.Name: E
Target.Description: Analyze the adequacy of and make improvements to an existing model or develop a mathematical model of a real phenomenon.

Target.Name: F
Target.Description: Identify important quantities in a practical situation and map their relationships (e.g., using diagrams, two-way tables, graphs, flowcharts, or formulas).

Target.Name: G
Target.Description: Identify, analyze and synthesize relevant external resources to pose or solve problems.
